component.name: getAccountFields
component.description: Retrieve all the details of account fields.

component.name: getAccountFieldById
component.description: Retrieve the details of given account field id.

component.name: getAccountImports
component.description: Retrieve all the details of account imports.

component.name: getAccountImportById
component.description: Retrieve the details of given account import id.

component.name: getAccountExports
component.description: Retrieve all the details of account fields.

component.name: getAccountExportById
component.description: Retrieve the details of given account field id.

component.name: getAccountExportDataById
component.description: Retrieve the data of given account export id.

component.name: getAccountLists
component.description: Retrieve all the details of account lists.

component.name: getAccountListById
component.description: Retrieve the details of given account list id.

component.name: createAccountExport
component.description: Creates a new account export definition.

component.name: createAccountImport
component.description: Creates a new account import definition.

component.name: createAccountImportData
component.description: Submits the data for the account import with the specified id.

component.name: deleteAccountExport
component.description: Deletes the specified accounts export definition.

component.name: deleteAccountExportData
component.description: Deletes the data for the account export with the specified id.

component.name: deleteAccountImport
component.description: Deletes the specified account import definition.

component.name: deleteAccountImportData
component.description: Deletes the data for the account import with the specified id.

component.name: updateAccountExport
component.description: Updates the account export definition with the specified id.

component.name: updateAccountImport
component.description: Updates the account import definition with the specified id.
